thread.title: Sorry, This Oil Route Is Closed Due to a Collapse in the Iran Deal—Energy Journal

author: Neanda Salvaterra
title: Sorry, This Oil Route Is Closed Due to a Collapse in the Iran Deal—Energy Journal
text: A daily digest of The Wall Street Journal’s coverage of energy companies, commodity markets and the forces that shape them. Send us tips, suggestions and complaints: EnergyJournal@wsj.com TRUMP’S IRAN SANCTIONS TO SHAKE UP GLOBAL OIL SUPPLY LINES U.S. President Donald Trump’s decision to reimpose sanctions on Iran means that prospective oil buyers will face a WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Insider Trading, New Broker Rules, Kanye Tweets Next Cuba Could Offer Hope for Investors in Iran
